name: Comet Culling
summary:
Comet Culling is a retro inspired, pixel art farming simulator set in space.

Join PR1NC3, a little helper android, as they travel through space in a plant-powered ship. Their battery is running low and the only way to charge it is to stop on a deserted planet and farm their fuel.

Discover alien species of plants, talk to a mysterious merchant that decided to stop by, read the logs saved on the ship and reveal what happened to PR1NC3 and their crew!
